mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.gdp_total, a.gdp_avg, a.tax_total, a.avg_loan_deviation, a.expenditure, a.gdp_growth_rate, a.expenditure_growth_rate, a.company_growth_count, a.avg_company_loan_deviation, a.people_activity, a.gdp_loan_rate, a.avg_company_loan, a.loan_ratio, a.crime_index, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.region, a.code FROM sys_region a
